## ChatHeadless.setChatLoadingStatus() method

Sets [ConversationState.isLoading](./chat-headless.conversationstate.isloading.md) to the specified loading state

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  isLoading | boolean | the loading state to set |
